detail: overview of cross-participant accuracy for each reading passage

detail: average of participant's accuracy on challenge questions

detail: average of participant's accuracy on all LDT task trials

description: LDT task, subject-level: accuracy delta between word and nonce trials
detail: ldtWord_meanACC minus ldtNonce_meanACC

description: LDT task, subject-level: response time delta between word and nonce trials
detail: ldtNonceCorr_meanRT minus ldtWordCorr_meanRT

description: LDT task, subject-level: response time (log-corrected) delta between word and nonce trials

detail: accuracy for a given trial

description: LDT task, trial-level: response time
detail: response time for a given trial

description: LDT task, trial-level: stimulus string
detail: actual letter string presented as stimulus

description: LDT task, trial-level: stimulus type
detail: indication of whether stimulus was "word" or "nonword" for a given trial
valueInfo: word, real word | nonce, not a real word

description: DCCS task, subject-level: adequate accuracy on Shape practice
detail: indication of whether participant passed DCCS shape practice trials (at least 75% accuracy in one of three possible practice blocks)

description: DCCS task, subject-level: adequate accuracy on Color practice
detail: indication of whether participant passed DCCS color practice trials (at least 75% accuracy in one of three possible practice blocks)

description: DCCS task, subject-level: overall participant accuracy
detail: average of participant's accuracy on all DCCS task trials

description: DCCS task, subject-level: average participant accuracy on toShape trials
detail: average of participant accurancy on toShape trials, which are defined as the set of SHAPE trials (infrequent stimulus type) in all COLOR+SHAPE trial pairs

description: DCCS task, subject-level: average participant accuracy on toShapePRE trials
detail: average of participant accurancy on toShapePRE trials, which are defined as the set of COLOR trials (frequent stimulus type) in all COLOR+SHAPE trial pairs

description: DCCS task, subject-level: average participant response time on toShape trials answered correctly
detail: average of participant response time on toShapeCorr trials, which are defined as the set of SHAPE trials (infrequent stimulus type) in all COLOR+SHAPE trial pairs where neither trial in the pair was answered erroneously

description: DCCS task, subject-level: average participant response time on toShapePRE trials answered correctly
detail: average of participant response time on toShapePRECorr trials, which are defined as the set of COLOR trials (frequent stimulus type) in all COLOR+SHAPE trial pairs where neither trial in the pair was answered erroneously

description: DCCS task, subject-level: log-transformed average participant response time on toShape trials answered correctly

description: DCCS task, subject-level: log-transformed average participant response time on toShapePRE trials answered correctly

detail: indication of whether syllable was disfluent or not (see protocol for details of error category)

description: readAloud task: duplication disfluency
detail: indication of whether syllable was disfluent or not (see protocol for details of error category)

description: readAloud task: insertion/filled pause disfluency
detail: indication of whether syllable was disfluent or not (see protocol for details of error category)

description: readAloud task: hesitation disfluency
detail: indication of whether syllable was disfluent or not (see protocol for details of error category)

description: readAloud task: elongation disfluency
detail: indication of whether syllable was disfluent or not (see protocol for details of error category)

description: readAloud task: omission disfluency
detail: indication of whether syllable was disfluent or not (see protocol for details of error category)

description: readAloud task: flipped production disfluency
detail: indication of whether syllable was disfluent or not (see protocol for details of error category)

description: readAloud task: error was corrected
detail: indication, for a disfluent syllable, of whether the participant repeated themselves in an attempt (successful or not) to correct a prior error

description: readAloud task: last syllable before a correction
detail: indication, when a participant has revised their production to make a correction, of the last syllable produced before the regression
valueInfo: 0, not last pre-correction syllable | 1, last pre-correction syllable

description: readAloud task: actual words/nonwords produced
detail: indication, for disfluent word(s) of the word or nonword actually produced

description: readAloud task: correction produced
detail: indication, for attempted corrections, of the word(s) actually produced
